<js>var src=java.ajax(source.getKey())
//java.log(src)
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
var document = JsDom.parse(src);

var items = document.select(".shuming > li");
var result = [];


for (var i = 0; i < items.size(); i++) {
    var li = items.get(i);
    var obj = {};
    
    
    var textElement = li.select("p > a").first();
    obj.text = textElement ? textElement.text() : "";
    
   
    obj.url = textElement ? textElement.attr("href") : "";
    
   
    var imgElement = li.select("a.tu > img").first();
    obj.img = imgElement ? imgElement.attr("src") : "";
    
    result.push(obj);
}
JSON.stringify(result);
</js>
